fields.Name: OAuth Authorization Initiated
fields.Description: Logs when a user initiates an OAuth 2.1 authorization flow for an MCP server connection, including the requested scopes and authorization server.

fields.Name: OAuth Authorization Completed
fields.Description: Logs when an OAuth authorization flow completes successfully with tokens received and stored.

fields.Name: OAuth Authorization Failed
fields.Description: Logs when an OAuth authorization flow fails due to user denial, timeout, or error from the authorization server.

fields.Name: OAuth Token Refreshed
fields.Description: Logs when OAuth tokens are successfully refreshed using a refresh token.

fields.Name: OAuth Token Refresh Failed
fields.Description: Logs when an OAuth token refresh fails, which may require user re-authorization.

fields.Name: OAuth Credentials Revoked
fields.Description: Logs when OAuth credentials are revoked by an administrator or the system.
